gameDetails.name: Tipping Cows
gameDetails.description:
Tipping Cows is a dexterity game of bovine shenanigans. Players take turns flicking discs in order to tip a cow (a.k.a. knock it over). Obstacles are in the way, however, and you lose a turn knocking into a tree. Hit a cowpie, and you lose one of your flickers.

After all cows are tipped, they score one point each or a loss of two for knocking over the bull. Special and optional rules add to the game for the different types of cows.

Highest score wins!
